name: The 12th International Conference on Research in Behavioral and Social Sciences
content: Nice, France will be the host of the 12th International Conference on Research in Behavioral and Social Sciences – ICRBS 2024\. This social sciences conference is a must-attend event for scientists, researchers, scholars, and other members of academia working in the field of behavioral and social sciences. The agenda will feature cutting-edge presentations from leading academics around the world. Are you one of them? Submit your paper! If selected, you will get a chance to present it – in-person or virtually – at one of the most respected social sciences conferences in the world, plus get published in indexed international academic journals. Three days of networking, cross-border learning, and engaging discussions. That’s what you can expect from one of the leading social science conferences of the year. As you are planning out your calendar for 2024, make sure to mark the dates of ICRBS.
